about.me: My name is Samuel, I am the owner of this Staking Pool, I am from El Salvador, I consider myself a honest, friendly, curious and hard working person. This Staking Pool is my personal project, it was hard to configure it properly and have invested a lot of time maintaining it, that's the reason why I have affection to it :)
about.server: My infrastructure is Cloud based, so I can offer you high availability and have configured failover to it, you can check my server information in my webpage to see a diagram. I have two relays, and two block producers (one is active and the other one is passive).
about.company: As you can see I am just a normal human being, not a company. I thought this project to live in the long term, I've been from the beginning of shelley, and will continue as long as I can, my plan is to reinvest any reward in this staking pool, so pledge and size of the pool will be increasing.
